column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Jinora says : " Korra , you have to go stop Su before she does something terrible . "
#Text=Opal says : " Stop her , we should be helping her . "
#Text=Korra says : " We have no idea where your mom is , or what her plan is .
#Text=Your leader , Su Beifong , attempted to attack me tonight while I slept , ignoring the terms of our truce .
#Text=Luckily , I now have her and her assault team in custody .
#Text=" Opal says : " No .

#Text=" Kuvira says : " Rest assured that I will not take revenge on the peaceful citizens of Zaofu , unless your remaining representatives meet me outside the city at dawn to offer the full and unconditional surrender of your city .
#Text=That is all .
#Text=" Opal says : " Korra , you ca n't let Kuvira get away with this !
#Text=We have to go break out Mom and my brothers !
#Text=" Jinora says : " You swore an oath of non-aggression when you became an airbender .
#Text=You ca n't just attack Kuvira !
#Text=" Opal says : " I do n't care about the oath !
#Text=I have to save my family !
#Text=" Korra says : " No , Jinora is right .
#Text=Your mom attacked the camp .
#Text=Kuvira was just defending herself .
#Text=" Opal says : " " Defending herself " ?
#Text=She was going to attack our city !
#Text=I ca n't believe you 're refusing to fight !
#Text=" Meelo says : " Why is that loudspeaker lady talking when I 'm trying to sleep ?
#Text=" Baatar says : " Korra , what are we going to do ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Jinora and I will go talk to Kuvira at dawn , and , maybe , we can work something out .
#Text=I promise , I 'll do everything I can to keep the peace .
#Text=" Opal says : " I 'll go with you .
#Text=" Ikki says : " We 'll go , too .
#Text=" Jinora says : " No !
#Text=Dad told us to find Korra , and we did .
#Text=Now you need to stay safe .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Come on !
#Text=Let us help !
#Text=" Korra says : " I ca n't risk anyone else being captured .
#Text=You can stay with Baatar and Huan while I work things out with Kuvira .
#Text=Make sure they get back to Tenzin if anything goes wrong .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Aw , man !
#Text=When am I gon na see some action ?
#Text="
